customRatioGuide.title: How to Use
customRatioGuide.step1: 1. Enter your desired width and height.
customRatioGuide.step2: 2. Click the lock icon to lock the aspect ratio. Modifying one value will auto-calculate the other.
customRatioGuide.step3: 3. Click the lock icon again to unlock and adjust values independently.

suggestion.title: Pro Tip
suggestion.desc: The {{preset}} aspect ratio is widely used for optimal display across modern screens.

library.title: Aspect Ratio Library
library.description: Discover the perfect aspect ratios for platforms and devices.

description.1:1: Square format. Ideal for profile pictures and social media grid posts.
description.1.91:1: Landscape format. Standard for LinkedIn and Facebook link previews.
description.9:16: Portrait format. Standard for Instagram Stories, Reels, and TikTok.
description.4:5: Portrait format. Recommended for Instagram feed posts to maximize screen space.
description.16:9: Widescreen format. The universal standard for HD video, YouTube, and TVs.
description.21:9: Ultrawide format. Common for premium monitors and cinematic gaming.
description.2.35:1: Cinemascope. The classic anamorphic standard for theatrical films.
description.2.39:1: Modern anamorphic widescreen standard for theatrical releases.
description.1.85:1: Standard widescreen format in US theatrical cinema.
description.19.5:9: Tall modern smartphone ratio, used to accommodate sensor notches/islands.
description.32:9: Super ultrawide aspect ratio, equivalent to dual 16:9 monitors.
description.4:3: Standard definition format. Classic TV and standard photography.
description.3:2: Classic 35mm film and standard DSLR photography ratio.
description.5:4: Traditional photography format and classic PC monitors.
description.golden: The Golden Ratio (~1.618), renowned for its aesthetic harmony.

importance.title: Why Aspect Ratios Matter
importance.description: Aspect ratios dictate how media is framed on a device. Using the correct ratio ensures your content isn't awkwardly stretched, squeezed, or cropped out of frame, delivering a professional viewing experience.

guide.description: Find the ideal aspect ratio and resolution for any project.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Learn how to make the most of the Aspect Ratio Calculator.

what.question: What is the Aspect Ratio Calculator?
what.answer: It's a free, professional tool designed to calculate media dimensions accurately. It helps developers, designers, and creators size their content perfectly for social media, video platforms, and print.

features.question: What can this tool do?
features.answer: It provides instant calculation across multiple units, an extensive library of platform presets, responsive value locking, and support for over 180 languages.

social.question: Which social platforms do you support?
social.answer: Instagram (1:1, 4:5, 9:16) | Facebook | X/Twitter (16:9) | LinkedIn | TikTok | Snapchat

video.question: Which video resolutions do you cover?
video.answer: YouTube (16:9, 9:16) | Vimeo | Twitch | Netflix | Theatrical widescreens

special.question: Do you support cinematic and print formats?
special.answer: Yes. We include Cinemascope (2.35:1), Ultrawide monitors (21:9), standard photography (3:2), ISO paper sizes (A4), and the Golden Ratio (1.618:1).

custom.question: How to use the custom ratio feature?
custom.answer: 1. Enter your desired width and height values|2. Click the lock button to maintain the current ratio - modifying either value will automatically calculate the other|3. Click the lock button again to unlock the ratio and freely adjust both values

results.question: What information is included in the calculation results?

features.multiPlatform: Support for all major platforms (TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, etc.)

howToUse.question: How to use the video aspect ratio calculator?
howToUse.answer: Simply select a platform preset or enter custom width and height values. The calculator will instantly show the aspect ratio, resolution, and other relevant metrics for your video content.

supportedPlatforms.question: Which platforms are supported?
supportedPlatforms.answer: We support all major platforms including TikTok, YouTube, Instagram, Douyin, Kuaishou, Bilibili, and many more. You can also use custom dimensions for any platform.

isFree.question: Is this calculator free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes, our video aspect ratio calculator is completely free to use with no registration required. Access all features without any limitations.

mobileSupport.question: Does it work on mobile devices?
mobileSupport.answer: Absolutely! Our calculator is fully optimized for mobile devices and tablets, providing the same functionality across all screen sizes.

platforms.question: 支持哪些平台？
platforms.answer: 支持抖音、快手、YouTube、Instagram、TikTok、Bilibili等所有主流社交媒体和视频平台。

accuracy.question: 计算结果准确吗？
accuracy.answer: 我们的计算器使用精确的数学算法，确保所有计算结果的准确性，适合专业内容创作使用。
